description: This file defines a Spring configuration class that registers a global filter for API Gateway. The filter adds an authentication user ID header to proxied requests based on the security principal, defaulting to a system user if none is present.

classes.name: GatewayConfiguration
classes.description: A Spring configuration class that sets up a global filter for the API Gateway to inject user identity headers into requests.

methods.name: customGlobalFilter
methods.description: Defines a bean that creates a global filter which adds the authenticated user's ID to headers of outgoing requests, defaulting to 'SYSTEM USER' if not authenticated.
